title: Yamane_Keto
author: Yamane_Keto
content: The Bitcoin network has been working for 99.988123487 1 % of the time since Jan 3 2009 02:54:25 GMT, when it started.Bitcoin 100.00% Uptime form 2014.Bitcoin down time was 2 TIMEs (CVE-2010-5139 https://www.cvedetails.com/cve/CVE-2010-5139/ and CVE-2013-322 https://www.cvedetails.com/cve/CVE-2013-3220/ )In 2013 and the chain forked into two. down time was about for 6 hours and 20 minutes.

comments.author: Shan85
comments.body: Quote from: Yamane_Keto on March 17, 2023, 02:22:11 PMThe Bitcoin network has been working for 99.988123487 1 % of the time since Jan 3 2009 02:54:25 GMT, when it started.Bitcoin 100.00% Uptime form 2014.Bitcoin down time was 2 TIMEs (CVE-2010-5139 https://www.cvedetails.com/cve/CVE-2010-5139/ and CVE-2013-322 https://www.cvedetails.com/cve/CVE-2013-3220/ )In 2013 and the chain forked into two. down time was about for 6 hours and 20 minutes.Thank you for sharing this interesting information about the uptime of the Bitcoin network since its inception in 2009. It's impressive to know that the network has been working for 99.988123487% of the time, which highlights the resilience and reliability of the Bitcoin blockchain.I appreciate you also mentioning the two instances of Bitcoin downtime, CVE-2010-5139 and CVE-2013-322, as well as the chain fork that occurred in 2013, which caused downtime for about 6 hours and 20 minutes. This information helps to provide a more complete picture of the history of the Bitcoin network and its ongoing evolution.Once again, thank you for sharing this insightful information about Bitcoin's uptime and its occasional downtime incidents

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Please consider to combine other indicators together with Uptime/ DowntimeNetwork hashrate: it shows the calculating power of the network as well as its capacity to fight against potential attacks. A bigger total network hashrate is, a stronger it is and a less probability of reorganization as well as attacks. Since 2009, the network hashrate has grown exponentially.Profitable days: it partially shows increases in adoption and demand on Bitcoin. We know Bitcoin has only 21 million coins in its total supply (and many million bitcoins lost forever).https://www.lookintobitcoin.com/charts/bitcoin-profitable-days/
